Package com.rotartsi.jgame.crypto

Class UserDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rotartsi.jgame.crypto.UserDatabase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    public class UserDatabase
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Handles logins and encrypts user data using their passcode.
    See Also:

      • UserDatabase

        public UserDatabase()
             throws NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                    NoSuchPaddingException
        New UserDatabase!
        Throws:
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - Bad encryption algorithm
        NoSuchPaddingException - Bad padding (incompatible or unrecognized)

    • Method Detail

      • createAccount

        public boolean createAccount​(String username,
                             char[] password)
                      throws NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                             InvalidKeyException
        Initialize an account with random Initialization Vector and salt.

        (Will abort if account already exists.)

        Parameters:
        username - Username to create account for
        password - Corresponding passcode
        Returns:
        Returns true if account creation succeeds.
        Throws:
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - No such encryption algorithm
        InvalidKeyException - Invalid encryption key

      • verifyPassword

        public boolean verifyPassword​(String username,
                              char[] password)
                       throws NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                              InvalidKeyException
        Check if the password matches the account
        Parameters:
        username - Account to check
        password - passcode
        Returns:
        true if the passcode matches the account.
        Throws:
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - No such encryption algorithm
        InvalidKeyException - Invalid key supplied

      • setUserData

        public boolean setUserData​(String username,
                           char[] password,
                           Object data)
                    throws IOException,
                           InvalidKeyException,
                           InvalidAlgorithmParameterException,
                           NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                           InvalidKeySpecException,
                           IllegalBlockSizeException,
                           BadPaddingException
        Serialize and encrypt the data and store it. - Data is encrypted using key generated with getKey(char[], byte[]) Will abort if password doesn't match the given username.
        Parameters:
        username - Account
        password - passcode
        data - data to store
        Returns:
        true if successful
        Throws:
        IOException - Cannot deserialize
        InvalidKeyException - Cannot decrypt (bad key)
        InvalidAlgorithmParameterException - Invalid params for decryption
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - Bad decrypt algorithm
        InvalidKeySpecException - Invalid key!
        IllegalBlockSizeException - Bad block size for block-chaining
        BadPaddingException - Bad padding for decryption!

      • accountExists

        public boolean accountExists​(String username)
        Check if account exists. No passcode required.
        Parameters:
        username - account
        Returns:
        true if account exists.

      • deleteAccount

        public boolean deleteAccount​(String username,
                             char[] password)
                      throws NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                             InvalidKeyException
        Delete account if the passcode is correct.
        Parameters:
        username - Account
        password - passcode
        Returns:
        true if account is successfully deleted.
        Throws:
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - Bad algorithm
        InvalidKeyException - Bad key supplied

      • getUserData

        public Object getUserData​(String username,
                          char[] password)
                   throws InvalidKeyException,
                          InvalidAlgorithmParameterException,
                          NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                          InvalidKeySpecException,
                          IOException,
                          IllegalBlockSizeException,
                          BadPaddingException,
                          ClassNotFoundException
        Retrieve user data stored using setUserData(String, char[], Object) only if the passcode is valid.
        Parameters:
        username - Account
        password - passcode
        Returns:
        Retrieved object. null if passcode verification failed or account doesn't exist.
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException - The serialized data is corrupt. (unrecognized class in serial)
        BadPaddingException - Unrecognized padding supplied
        InvalidKeyException - Invalid key!
        InvalidAlgorithmParameterException - Bad params for encrypt!
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - Bad algorithm!
        InvalidKeySpecException - Invalid encrypt key!
        IOException - Cannot serialize!
        IllegalBlockSizeException - Bad block size for block-chaining
